designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened stoneflies (Plecoptera) of Great Britain
designations.source_description: A review of the scarce and threatened stoneflies (Plecoptera) of Great Britain. Craig R. Macadam. 2014.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa which are neither threatened nor near threatened.
designations.criteria_description: This species lives in seepages flowing through marshes.  Whilst this is an often overlooked and undersurveyed habitat this species appears to be genuinely rare with only 14 modern records.

designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened stoneflies (Plecoptera) of Great Britain
designations.source_description: A review of the scarce and threatened stoneflies (Plecoptera) of Great Britain. Craig R. Macadam. 2014.
designations.reporting_category: Nationally Scarce, Nationally Rare and Other Species
designations.designation: Nationally Rare. Includes Red Listed taxa
designations.designation_description: Nationally Rare - Occurring in 15 or fewer hectads in Great Britain. Includes rare species qualifying under the main IUCN criteria.
designations.criteria_description: This species lives in seepages flowing through marshes.  Whilst this is an often overlooked and undersurveyed habitat this species appears to be genuinely rare with only 14 modern records.
